blueprint.description: Installs and configures gist (potentially the best command-line gister) on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [gist](https://github.com/defunkt/gist) provides a command that you can use from your terminal to upload content to https://gist.github.com/. This role will optionally set up a dotfile that handles authentication if you pass the appropriate configuration.
blueprint.name: gist
blueprint.title: gist
